markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Archaeologist's Luck](/Feats.aspx?ID=6250) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
<trait label="Flourish" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=606" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 184 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Archaeologist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=237)

**Frequency**
once per hour

**Prerequisites**
[Archaeologist Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6246)

**Trigger**
You fail a check against a trap, such as a  [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=50) check to [Disable](/Actions.aspx?ID=2411) the trap or a Reflex save to avoid its effects.

</column>

---

You are more than just skillful; your drive to find the secrets of the past manifests as a strange kind of luck. Reroll the failed check and use the new result.
name: Archaeologist's Luck
